data.title: Lay It Down – Leo Ieiri
data.meta_description: Word of the Day posts are great for learning new words, but sometimes we want to learn through more engaging styles. My high school French teacher always enjoyed sharing songs with us, and lyrics can sometimes be simple enough if you actually analyze them. Here's one of my favorite songs as of late. Lyrics and…
data.text:
Word of the Day posts are great for learning new words, but sometimes we want to learn through more engaging styles. My high school French teacher always enjoyed sharing songs with us, and lyrics can sometimes be simple enough if you actually analyze them. Here’s one of my favorite songs as of late. Lyrics and translations from:

And for more from Leo Ieiri, take a look at my site!

http://cs2033.gaul.csd.uwo.ca/users/htsang22/assign3/music.html

ROMAJI

kimi no koe shiroku hibiku soba ni ite yo to

futari tsunaide’ta ro-do kiesou na yoru

I wanna lay it down

shinjitsu no tobira wo sagasou

mimi wo sumaseba kikoeru yo

futari no mirai

kisetsu wa mata sugite’ku boku wo okizari ni shite

sayonara no uta utaou tabidachi no asa

I wanna lay it down

furidashita ame ni utarete

tooi jikan no saki made

yasashiku nareta

yakusoku no basho de toikakete miru

kokoro wa ima demo

nukumori shinjite machitsudzukete’ru

Lay it down

shinjitsu no tobira wo sagasou

kodoku na taiyou ni

niji wo kakeyou

I wanna lay it down

shinjitsu no tobira wo sagasou

mimi wo sumaseba kikoeru yo

futari no mirai

I wanna lay it down

furidashita ame ni utarete

tooi jikan no saki made

yasashiku nareta

kisetsu wa mata sugite’ku (boku wo) okizari ni shite

ENGLISH

Your voice rings out whitely to stay by your side

A night when the road we were connected by is about it disappear

I wanna lay it down

Let’s find the door to the truth

If you listen closely, you can hear it

Our future

The seasons are changing again, leaving me behind

Let’s sing a song of goodbye, the morning I set off on my trip

I wanna lay it down

Caught in the rain that’s started to fall

I was able to become kinder

Until the end of our distant time

I’ll ask the question at the place where we’re meeting

My heart believes in your warmth

And continues to wait, even now

Lay it down

Let’s find the door to the truth

Let’s put a rainbow

On the lonely sun

I wanna lay it down

Let’s find the door to the truth

If you listen closely, you can hear it

Our future

I wanna lay it down

Caught in the rain that’s started to fall

I was able to become kinder

Until the end of our distant time

The seasons are changing again, leaving (me) behind
